title: User Registrations
query: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('day', created_at) AS time, COUNT(*) AS value FROM users WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('day', created_at) ORDER BY time

title: Active Users (Hourly)
query: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('hour', last_login) AS time, COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS value FROM user_sessions WHERE last_login >= $__timeFrom() AND last_login <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('hour', last_login) ORDER BY time

title: Error Rate (% per minute)
query: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('minute', ts) AS time, (COUNT(CASE WHEN status_code >= 400 THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)) AS value FROM application_logs WHERE ts >= $__timeFrom() AND ts <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('minute', ts) ORDER BY time

title: API P95 Latency
query: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('minute', request_time) AS time, PERCENTILE_CONT(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY response_time_ms) AS value FROM api_requests WHERE request_time >= $__timeFrom() AND request_time <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('minute', request_time) ORDER BY time

title: Throughput (RPM)
query: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('minute', request_time) AS time, COUNT(*) AS value FROM api_requests WHERE request_time >= $__timeFrom() AND request_time <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('minute', request_time) ORDER BY time

title: CPU Utilization
query: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('minute', collected_at) AS time, AVG(cpu_percent) AS value FROM system_metrics WHERE collected_at >= $__timeFrom() AND collected_at <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('minute', collected_at) ORDER BY time

title: Memory Usage
query: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('minute', collected_at) AS time, AVG(memory_bytes_used) AS value FROM system_metrics WHERE collected_at >= $__timeFrom() AND collected_at <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('minute', collected_at) ORDER BY time

title: Cache Hit Ratio
query: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('minute', collected_at) AS time, (SUM(hits) * 100.0 / NULLIF(SUM(hits + misses),0)) AS value FROM cache_metrics WHERE collected_at >= $__timeFrom() AND collected_at <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('minute', collected_at) ORDER BY time

title: DB Connections
query: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('minute', connection_time) AS time, COUNT(*) AS value FROM db_connections WHERE connection_time >= $__timeFrom() AND connection_time <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('minute', connection_time) ORDER BY time

title: Order Conversion Rate
query: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('hour', event_time) AS time, (SUM(CASE WHEN event = 'purchase' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN event IN ('view','add_to_cart','purchase') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0)) AS value FROM funnel_events WHERE event_time >= $__timeFrom() AND event_time <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('hour', event_time) ORDER BY time

title: Payment Failure Rate
query: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('minute', created_at) AS time, (SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'failed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)) AS value FROM payments WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('minute', created_at) ORDER BY time
